subject: Re: How rude!
author: SCampbel72
full_text:
I AGREE Frank. There will always be those who try and make a buck where they can. Just keep doing what you are doing and there are those who are silently following you.

Steven
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
> http://www.prrsociety.org/worldwideghostbox.html
> 
>  None of these crackheads out there ever ask me anything,  any input, or
> technical advice. Always they want to act like the onlyest freaking
> worldwide experts with the box. Coletta will not even acknowledge an e-mail
> from me, guess he's afraid I'll contradict his expertness. Way too many of
> these presumptuous ego driven dorks out there on the web. All seeking the
> fame and fortune, not knowledge.
> 
>  Frank-S
>
